body:
- The algorithm should be configurable (if it is today, `spack checksum -h` says nothing about it)
- The default algorithm should not be vulnerable to a major collision attack (unlike MD5 or SHA-1, the former of which I suspect to be the current default). SHA-256 is a popular choice these days.
- `spack checksum` should checksum the `resource()`s of a package as well.
title: Spack checksum improvement suggestions
